name: Accredible
headline: Digital credentials to recognize achievement
description:
Accredible is connecting education with economic value. We want hiring to be about what you can do, your skills and potential and we want education to be better at improving careers.

Accredible is the industry-leading digital credentialing platform that securely issues, manages, tracks, and verifies over 80 million career-advancing credentials globally. Accredible integrates with learning software, including Canvas, D2L Brightspace, Kajabi, Kryterion Webassessor, Moodle, Thinkific, and more. Over 2,000 leading universities, associations, and technology companies such as Google, Skillsoft, Slack, Junior Achievement USA, Chartered Banker Institute, University of Cambridge, AMPP, Hootsuite, IEEE, Cengage, MIT, Rutgers, UC Berkeley, AMBA, and The Digital Marketing Institute rely on Accredible to create, deliver, and manage digital certificates and open badges.

# Accelerate learner and program growth
Create and issue branded digital certificates and badges that attract and retain learners, boost engagement, and drive program growth with the world’s leading digital credential platform.
[Book a demo](http://www.accredible.com/</demo>)
Trusted by 2,300+ leading universities, associations, and technology companies

](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b126d122a164fb64986a5_Group%208988382.webp)](http://www.accredible.com/</customers>)
## Our platform puts brands in control of their program growth
[Explore our platform](http://www.accredible.com/</platform>)
### Scale your program with ease
Spending your nights manually issuing paper or PDF certificates? Or requiring learners to create a login to accept their credentials?That’s the old, limiting way. Accredible enables you to design and auto-issue verifiable digital credentials that learners easily share to social media, websites, and email — boosting program awareness and referrals — while enabling you to track it all in real-time.
[![Arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b0c6ee40a7d51ec69576f_Group%208988193.webp)See how Workato increased program learners by 80%](http://www.accredible.com/<https:/www.accredible.com/customer-stories/workato>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b0c4128421aa7a551d024_Group%208988686.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b0de18bda4a590a306a1b_Group%208988687.webp)
### Increase learner engagement
You’ve worked hard to develop and launch a course, but engagement and completion rates aren’t ideal. We’ve all been there.Not anymore. We’ll help you develop a program strategy to reach your goals, and our platform enables you to create visualized learning pathways, stackable microcredentials, and automated email campaigns that incentivize course completion, credential sharing, and continued learning.
[![Arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b0c6ee40a7d51ec69576f_Group%208988193.webp)See how Frogames increased course completion by 3x & credential sharing by 67%](http://www.accredible.com/<https:/www.accredible.com/customer-stories/frogames>)
### Elevate program value
In today’s skill-based world, ensuring learners can communicate their abilities and translate them into future opportunities has become paramount to program success.With Accredible, you can instantly award learners with fully branded digital credentials that showcase acquired skills and earning criteria and recognize them via an online directory of credential holders. You’ll give learners — and your program — a competitive edge.
[![Arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b0c6ee40a7d51ec69576f_Group%208988193.webp)See how Syracuse University scaled its digital credentials program campus-wide](http://www.accredible.com/<https:/www.accredible.com/customer-stories/syracuse-university>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b0f52e40a7d51ec6b768e_Group%208988688.webp)
## The Accredible advantage
Accredible is the only digital credential solution that combines a platform purpose-built for program growth with deep expertise and support. We’re not just a platform. We're a trusted partner in helping your program succeed.
[Explore features![Arrow pointing to right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb6_arrow-white.svg)](http://www.accredible.com/<#>)
[Everything you need](http://www.accredible.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[It’s your brand](http://www.accredible.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Easily share credentials](http://www.accredible.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[A true partnership](http://www.accredible.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
Everything you need to grow your program
With Accredible, you can manage and measure everything from issuing career-advancing digital credentials to visualizing learning pathways to spotlighting certified learners — all with one platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b35dc28421aa7a571eb67_Group%208988395.webp)
Put your brand front and center
Our platform provides unmatched customization and white-labeling to give you complete control of the recipient experience — with brandable landing pages, emails, URLs, learner directories, and digital wallet cards.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b367d40f287484e380a2b_Group%208988660.webp)
Accept and share credentials with ease
Accredible’s One-Click Acceptance removes unnecessary account creation friction and enables learners to easily share their credentials online — helping generate brand awareness and program referrals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b367d478d2158a74f8a84_Group%208988689.webp)
Partnership beyond the platform
From technical onboarding to program strategy and beyond, we offer a roadmap based on over a decade of experience to help you provide the best learner experience and reach your program goals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b367d90f30da22a698559_Group%208988690.webp)

Connect your favorite tools
Accredible seamlessly integrates with your existing systems—from LMS, CMS, and publishing tools—to streamline issuing credentials without disrupting your workflows.
[View all Integrations](http://www.accredible.com/</services/integrations>)

### Unlock your program's potential

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/670425134cc1c05f257f438d_The%20Accredible%20Difference%20Thumbnail.webp)

## Our platform puts brands in control of their program growth
Explore our platform⟨32⟩
### Scale your program with ease
Spending your nights manually issuing paper or PDF certificates? Or requiring learners to create a login to accept their credentials?That’s the old, limiting way. Accredible enables you to design and auto-issue verifiable digital credentials that learners easily share to social media, websites, and email — boosting program awareness and referrals — while enabling you to track it all in real-time.
![Arrow pointing right⟨33⟩See how Workato increased program learners by 80%](http://www.accredible.com/<https:/www.accredible.com/customer-stories/workato>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b0c4128421aa7a551d024_Group%208988686.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b0de18bda4a590a306a1b_Group%208988687.webp)
### Increase learner engagement
You’ve worked hard to develop and launch a course, but engagement and completion rates aren’t ideal. We’ve all been there.Not anymore. We’ll help you develop a program strategy to reach your goals, and our platform enables you to create visualized learning pathways, stackable microcredentials, and automated email campaigns that incentivize course completion, credential sharing, and continued learning.
![Arrow pointing right⟨33⟩See how Frogames increased course completion by 3x & credential sharing by 67%](http://www.accredible.com/<https:/www.accredible.com/customer-stories/frogames>)
### Elevate program value
In today’s skill-based world, ensuring learners can communicate their abilities and translate them into future opportunities has become paramount to program success.With Accredible, you can instantly award learners with fully branded digital credentials that showcase acquired skills and earning criteria and recognize them via an online directory of credential holders. You’ll give learners — and your program — a competitive edge.
![Arrow pointing right⟨33⟩See how Syracuse University scaled its digital credentials program campus-wide](http://www.accredible.com/<https:/www.accredible.com/customer-stories/syracuse-university>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b0f52e40a7d51ec6b768e_Group%208988688.webp)
## The Accredible advantage
Accredible is the only digital credential solution that combines a platform purpose-built for program growth with deep expertise and support. We’re not just a platform. We're a trusted partner in helping your program succeed.
Explore features![Arrow pointing to right⟨34⟩](http://www.accredible.com/<#>)
Everything you need⟨35⟩It’s your brand⟨36⟩Easily share credentials⟨37⟩A true partnership⟨38⟩
Everything you need to grow your program
With Accredible, you can manage and measure everything from issuing career-advancing digital credentials to visualizing learning pathways to spotlighting certified learners — all with one platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b35dc28421aa7a571eb67_Group%208988395.webp)
Put your brand front and center
Our platform provides unmatched customization and white-labeling to give you complete control of the recipient experience — with brandable landing pages, emails, URLs, learner directories, and digital wallet cards.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b367d40f287484e380a2b_Group%208988660.webp)
Accept and share credentials with ease
Accredible’s One-Click Acceptance removes unnecessary account creation friction and enables learners to easily share their credentials online — helping generate brand awareness and program referrals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b367d478d2158a74f8a84_Group%208988689.webp)
Partnership beyond the platform
From technical onboarding to program strategy and beyond, we offer a roadmap based on over a decade of experience to help you provide the best learner experience and reach your program goals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b367d90f30da22a698559_Group%208988690.webp)

generated_description:
Accredible is a prominent digital credentialing platform based in Berkeley, California, founded in 2013 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch IK12. Its mission? To bridge the gap between education and economic opportunity by providing secure, verifiable digital credentials that enhance career prospects. 

At its core, Accredible focuses on enabling learning institutions, associations, and technology companies to issue and manage digital certificates and badges effortlessly. With over 80 million credentials issued globally, it's become a trusted partner for more than 2,000 educational entities, including heavyweights like Google, MIT, and UC Berkeley.

The platform integrates seamlessly with various learning management systems (LMS) like Canvas, D2L Brightspace, and Moodle, making it a versatile option for organizations looking to innovate their credentialing processes. Accredible provides features such as customizable credential design, real-time tracking, and automated sharing to social media, thus "boasting program awareness and learner engagement."

Accredible thrives on a dual approach — not only does it offer a powerful technological solution, but it also emphasizes customer partnership, offering professional services to ensure that clients achieve their program goals. The company recognizes that in today’s world, credentials need to communicate skills effectively to open opportunities, and they help institutions create meaningful credentials that add real value.

Their emphasis on microcredentials and digital badges allows for a more granular representation of skills, catering to modern learner expectations. 

With a team of about 125 employees, Accredible is well-positioned in the SaaS market, specifically in the San Francisco Bay Area. It's not just about certificates; it's about unlocking potential. If you're in education or training, it might be worth exploring how digital credentials can elevate your programs. For more information, visit their website at [accredible.com](http://www.accredible.com).
